abstract: A well-timed employee stock option exchange has delivered a generous windfall to nearly all of Google’s 20,000 workers–about $117,000.
snippet: A well-timed employee stock option exchange has delivered a generous windfall to nearly all of Google’s 20,000 workers–about $117,000.
lead_paragraph: Like many companies, Google has a tradition of giving holiday presents to its employees — an Android phone last year, $1,000 in cash net of taxes the year before. This year, they got Google’s soon-to-be-released phone.

headline.main: Early Holiday Gift For Googlers: $2.3 Billion
